snippet: Whatever happened to the tactic? Players ran wild on the bases in the 1980s and early 1990s before baseball was overtaken by sluggers bashing home runs.
lead_paragraph: Whatever happened to the tactic? Players ran wild on the bases in the 1980s and early 1990s before baseball was overtaken by sluggers bashing home runs.

headline.seo: The Pros and Cons of the Hit-and-Run
headline.main: Debating the Wisdom and Foolhardiness of the Hit-and-Run
headline.print_headline: Debating the Wisdom and Foolhardiness of the Hit-and-Run
